document.full_text: a group of canadian banks and pension funds are hoping their c$3.6 billion offer for tmx group will keep the nation's largest stock market from falling into foreign hands, but questions remained on sunday whether that is reason enough to succeed.
document.title: canada banks tmx bid tops lse, but doubts remain
lines_and_colors: a group of canadian banks and pension funds are hoping their c$3.6 billion offer for tmx group will keep the nation's largest stock market from falling into foreign hands, but questions remained on sunday whether that is reason enough to succeed.
